last line is plain text ^

comments.body: -x flag in https://github.com/temporalio/docker-builds/blob/main/docker/auto-setup.sh#L3 and https://github.com/temporalio/docker-builds/blob/main/docker/auto-setup.sh#L37 variable and many other lines referencing pw
have y'all raised a CVE yet?

title: temporalio/auto-setup logging postgres pw
